title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 13 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 13 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3: Recap of the enlightening phone conversation with Alex Berenson. YouTube censored Trump's CPAC speech. The Woke Virus has taken over sports. The highly paid Stephen A. Smith is under fire for Shohei Ohtani comments. Why does the blue check mark brigade support everything and anything Fauci says? Democrats love to claim anything they disagree with is racist. Rush's Timeless Wisdom on Voter ID. Lord Voldemort Fauci says young children should wear masks.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck
